meanings.definition: The act of participating in fellowship with others.
meanings.sent1: After the meeting, the fellowshipping among the members was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: Churches often have fellowshipping events to bring people together.
meanings.sent3: The fellowshipping at the picnic turned into a lively game of charades.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, team spirit is crucial for successful fellowshipping.
meanings.sent5: The sense of community created by fellowshipping can be truly uplifting.

meanings.definition: To engage in social activities with others in a friendly and welcoming manner.
meanings.sent1: We enjoy fellowshipping with our neighbors during weekend barbecues.
meanings.sent2: During the retreat, we spent hours fellowshipping around the campfire.
meanings.sent3: The group decided to fellowshipping by organizing a movie night.
meanings.sent4: She excels at fellowshipping and always makes newcomers feel at ease.
meanings.sent5: Fellowshipping with colleagues outside of work can strengthen relationships.
